overview_of_class: The course is for graduating seniors pursuing the dance major and is intended to mentor the senior concert as well as prepare for entry into the professional world. The seminar provides opportunities for students to explore issues related to this important transition.
name: Senior Seminar
title: SoC DANCE 395-1-20 Senior Seminar
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Dance Majors who are Juniors, Seniors and/or Graduate Students
Add Consent: Instructor Consent Required

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course is for graduating seniors pursuing the dance major and is intended to mentor the senior concert as well as prepare for entry into the professional world. The seminar provides opportunities for students to explore issues related to this important transition.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: This class is offered in the Spring Quarter for one full credit. However, students must be enrolled in Fall and Winter for no credit.

subject: DANCE
